Please note that parties are not allowed at this place. Respecting the neighbors is also very important to me.

Best,
Barbara

description: Stay with your family in the heart of Berlin, where the sights will be within walking distance. A spacious apartment with two full bedrooms, each equipped with large comfortable beds, will give you a comfortable stay after a busy day. In the living room there is a large bed, elegantly hidden behind the curtains, which creates an additional private space. For even more convenience, there is a folding sofa, which easily turns into an extra bed.

name: Sonniges Haus mit Garten und Terrasse
description:
You will stay in a modern, comfortable house with a beautiful view into the green garden. In summertime you would like to start your day with a coffee on the upper terrasse, then having a breakfast in the garden before you start by bus, train (S-Bahn) to your sightseeing in Berlin: Kurfürstendamm, "Unter den Linden", Potsdamer Platz, "Das Stadtschloss".

You will stay in a family home that is striktly non smoking.

We are happy to welcome you soon.

Katharina

Cosy, large apartment in Schöneberg, right next to the beautiful and trendy „Akazienkiez“ and only a short ride away to the city centre, Kreuzberg, Neukölln or Ku‘Damm.

The apartment is a typical „Berliner Altbau“ with high ceilings and oak parquet. The apartment is very bright and has a great size with 154 m2 and 2 bedrooms, 1 living room & 1 dining room. The apartment is very well equipped which makes it ideally for couples, families or a group of friends.

name: Family-Adventures in Berlin
description: When we are on holidays, we would like to offer our flat. Its perfect with little kids, but also for friends a great place. Enjoy BBQ with our neighbours in the backyard or explore the wonderful city. We can advice you for nature, kids activities, clubbing and alternative sightseeing. You can use our car and bikes, if you like. Our home is close to public transport. Its 3 stops to "Ostkreuz" and a quiet and safe neighborhood.

It's furnished and equipped like we want it for ourselves, not like usual holiday places. You can use everything in the kitchen like tea, coffee, oil, spices.

description:
This large flat is in the Prenzlauer Berg area of central Berlin and is ideally suited for parents with kids.

It is right opposite a park with beautiful trees. Within 200 metres you find two playgrounds, a skate park, two sports pitches, tennis courts, a beach volleyball court, table tennis tables, two ice-cream parlours, a beer garden, a cinema and good coffee joints.

Only a few bus stops away from the centre this flat is the perfect base to chill out after sightseeing.
